title: #75: Travel Hacks and Travel Bugs, Tips and Tricks for Travel
itunes:title: #75: Travel Hacks and Travel Bugs, Tips and Tricks for Travel
description:
On this episode we are in the South of France talking all things travel. We get caught up with our experience during our month long stay in France. We talk travel tips and tricks. We discuss how to beat jet lag and pack properly and what to do to get the best information from the locals in any town. We also discuss travel programs and credit card programs to utilize to make travel easier. 

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE

This episode is brought to you by The Skinny Confidential Bombshell Body Guide and Meal plan. 

tired of combating inflammation & bloat? Want to feel lighter and sexier?
